state: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. Your first objective is to try to travel east. With that done, make absolutely sure that the door in the shower is unlocked. And then, make sure that the door in the shower is ajar. After that, head south. After that, go west. With that done, try to head south. And then, travel west. That done, go to the south. Then, venture west. Once you succeed at that, take a trip south. Next, travel east. If you can manage that, attempt to venture east. Then, take a trip north. With that over with, retrieve the passkey from the floor of the spare room. That's it! -= Parlor =- You find yourself in a parlor. An usual kind of place. You make out a bed stand. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bed stand. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Parlor =-0/1

-= Shower =- You find yourself in a shower. A standard kind of place. You see a locked trunk. You see a table. The table is ordinary. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst. There is a closed door leading south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Shower =-0/2
-= Sauna =- You've entered a sauna. There is an open door leading north. There is an open portal leading west. > -= Sauna =-0/5
-= Laundromat =- You find yourself in a laundromat. There is an open portal leading east. There is an open gate leading south. > -= Laundromat =-0/6

-= Bar =- Look at that sign! What does it say? It says Welcome to the bar? Well that's cool. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a bed. The bed is normal. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it? There is an open gate leading north. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Bar =-0/7

-= Bedchamber =- You've entered a bedchamber. Let's see what's in here. You see a shelf. The shelf appears to be empty. What's that over there? It looks like it's a recliner. The recliner is typical. However, the recliner, like an empty recliner, has nothing on it. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Bedchamber =-0/8

-= Workshop =- Well, here we are in the workshop. You see a locked ordinary looking bureau in the corner. You see a bookshelf. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Workshop =-0/9

-= Scullery =- You arrive in a scullery. An usual kind of place. The room is well lit. You make out a closed chest. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Scullery =-0/10

-= Bedroom =- Wow! You're in a bedroom. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Bedroom =-0/11

-= Steam Room =- You are in a steam room. A standard one. You can make out a locked cabinet. You can make out a rack. The rack is standard. The rack appears to be empty. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Steam Room =-0/12

-= Laundry Place =- You find yourself in a laundry place. An ordinary kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call "looking." There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Laundry Place =-0/13

-= Spare Room =- You are in a spare room. A normal kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west. There is a passkey on the floor. > -= Spare Room =-0/14
